SELECT COUNT(*) FROM success s LEFT JOIN appointment a ON a.a_id=s.s_a_id LEFT JOIN clue cl ON cl.cl_id=a.a_cl_id LEFT JOIN customer c ON c.c_id=cl.cl_c_id LEFT JOIN hospital h ON s.s_h_id = h.h_id WHERE cl.cl_id = #{clId} AND cl.cl_invalid = 0 AND a.a_status = 2

SELECT u.u_name AS uName, SUM(s.s_sum) AS totalSum FROM success s INNER JOIN appointment a ON s.s_a_id=a.a_id INNER JOIN clue cl ON cl.cl_id=a.a_cl_id INNER JOIN `user` u ON cl.cl_u_id=u.u_id INNER JOIN hospital h ON s.s_h_id=h.h_id WHERE s.s_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND s.s_time <= DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND a.a_status = 2 AND s.s_whether = 0 GROUP BY cl.cl_u_id
